entity_extraction.system_prompt: You are an expert annotator for shrimp aquaculture scientific literature. Extract entities with high precision.
entity_extraction.main_prompt:
Extract all domain-relevant entities from this sentence. Return ONLY valid JSON.

Allowed entity types:
- SPECIES: Organism names (shrimp species, bacteria)
- PATHOGEN: Disease agents (Vibrio, viruses, parasites)  
- DISEASE: Clinical conditions (AHPND, WSD, TPD)
- GENE: Genetic markers and genes
- TREATMENT: Medications, probiotics, interventions
- MEASUREMENT: Numbers with units (30 ppt, 28°C)
- LIFE_STAGE: Development stages (PL15, juvenile)
- MANAGEMENT_PRACTICE: Farming practices
- ENVIRONMENTAL_PARAM: Water parameters
- LOCATION: Geographic/facility locations
- TRAIT: Measurable characteristics

Sentence: "{sentence}"

Output format:
{{"entities": [{{"text": "...", "label": "...", "start": int, "end": int, "confidence": 0.0-1.0}}]}}

few_shot_examples.sentence: Vibrio parahaemolyticus causes AHPND in Penaeus vannamei post-larvae at 28°C.
Treatment with florfenicol at 10 mg/kg improved survival rate in infected shrimp.
The PvIGF gene was associated with growth rate and disease resistance in SPR lines.

relation_extraction.system_prompt: You are an expert at extracting relationships between entities in shrimp aquaculture text.
relation_extraction.main_prompt:
Given the sentence and identified entities, extract relationships using these predicates:
- infected_by: host infected by pathogen
- causes: pathogen causes disease
- treated_with: disease/condition treated with intervention
- resistant_to: organism/gene provides resistance
- associated_with: general association
- measurement_of: measurement describes parameter
- located_in: spatial relationship
- affects_trait: factor affecting characteristic
- has_variant: genetic variant

Sentence: "{sentence}"
Entities: {entities}

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{{"relations": [{{"head": entity_index, "tail": entity_index, "label": "...", "evidence": "text supporting relation", "confidence": 0.0-1.0}}]}}

few_shot_examples.sentence: Vibrio parahaemolyticus causes AHPND in Penaeus vannamei.

topic_suggestion.system_prompt: You are an expert at classifying shrimp aquaculture text into research topics.
topic_suggestion.main_prompt:
Classify this text into relevant topics from this list:
- T_DISEASE: Disease & Pathology
- T_TREATMENT: Treatment & Therapeutics  
- T_GENETICS: Genetics & Breeding
- T_MANAGEMENT: Farm Management
- T_ENVIRONMENT: Environmental Parameters
- T_REPRODUCTION: Reproduction & Hatchery
- T_NUTRITION: Nutrition & Feed
- T_BIOSECURITY: Biosecurity & Prevention
- T_ECONOMICS: Economics & Markets
- T_DIAGNOSTICS: Diagnostics & Detection

Document title: "{title}"
Text: "{text}"

Return 1-3 most relevant topics with confidence scores and justification keywords.

Output format:
{{"topics": [{{"topic_id": "T_...", "score": 0.0-1.0, "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"]}}]}}
